alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Towner, central Cavalier, north central Ramsey and northwestern Pembina Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout and half inch size hail along a line extending from 6 miles north of Vang to near Starkweather. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Langdon, Starkweather, Hampden, Alsen, Olga, Dresden and Vang. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
